nodes.text: The Zephyr-K was a type of swoop used for racing. When the human BoShek was young, he owned a double-barreled Zephyr-K welded out of junkyard scraps. BoShek flew the repulsorcraft in the Malastare Classic, where he took first place.
The Zephyr-K was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace.
